Plant Growing Conditions: Requires indirect sunlight, well-draining potting mix, and regular watering. Thrives in moderate humidity.
Plant Essentials: Keep in a room with stable temperatures, avoid direct sunlight, use a specialized orchid fertilizer during the growing season.

Plant Growing Conditions: Prefers full sun, well-drained soil, and regular watering. Pruning is essential for maintaining shape and promoting blooming.
Plant Essentials: Apply organic mulch around the base, use balanced fertilizer during the growing season, watch for pests and diseases.

Plant Growing Conditions: Requires well-drained soil, full sun to partial shade, and regular watering during the growing season.
Plant Essentials: Allow foliage to die back naturally after blooming, lift and divide bulbs every few years to maintain vigor, protect from rodents.

Plant Growing Conditions: Thrives in partial shade, moist, well-drained soil, and consistent moisture. Prune after flowering to encourage new growth and blooms.
Plant Essentials: Apply a balanced fertilizer in spring, water deeply during dry spells, protect from harsh winds and extreme temperatures.

Plant Growing Conditions: Prefers well-drained soil, full sun to partial shade, and regular watering during active growth.
Plant Essentials: Allow foliage to die back naturally after blooming, divide overcrowded clumps every few years, protect bulbs from excessive moisture.

Plant Growing Conditions: Requires well-drained soil, full sun to partial shade, and regular watering. Mulching helps retain soil moisture.
Plant Essentials: Provide support for tall varieties, deadhead spent blooms to promote new flower production, divide clumps every few years.

Plant Growing Conditions: Thrives in full sun to partial shade, fertile, well-drained soil. Mulch to retain moisture and suppress weeds.
Plant Essentials: Provide support for heavy blooms, avoid overhead watering to prevent fungal diseases, divide clumps every few years.

Plant Growing Conditions: Prefers well-drained soil, full sun, and good air circulation. Deadhead spent blooms to encourage continuous flowering.
Plant Essentials: Apply a balanced fertilizer during the growing season, water deeply but infrequently to promote deep root growth, divide clumps every few years.

Plant Growing Conditions: Thrives in full sun, well-drained soil. Provide support for tall varieties and water regularly.
Plant Essentials: Apply a balanced fertilizer at planting time, deadhead spent blooms to encourage continuous flowering, harvest seeds for birds or snacks.

Plant Growing Conditions: Prefers full sun, well-drained soil. Water regularly and deadhead spent blooms to promote continuous flowering.
Plant Essentials: Apply a balanced liquid fertilizer every two weeks, pinch back leggy growth to encourage bushiness, protect from aphids and other pests.

Plant Description: Known for its long, upright leaves with striking patterns.
Glossy, dark green leaves that are extremely low maintenance.
Heart-shaped leaves that come in various shades of green and variegations.
Large, lush leaves that can vary greatly in shape and color depending on the species.
Arching leaves with a central rosette and tiny white flowers.
Dark green leaves with white flowers that are often mistaken for petals.
Known for their intricately patterned leaves that often feature striking combinations of colors.
Large, violin-shaped leaves that add a touch of drama to any room.
Thick, rubbery leaves that are typically dark green or burgundy.
Round, coin-like leaves that grow on long, slender stems.
